timeline.bodyText: Does this class still contain duplicated code as mentioned in issue #14 and should this be changed?
timeline.author: RHenigan

replies.bodyText: It doesn't really matter honestly because the class will be deprecated and not maintained anymore
replies.author: bilal-alsharifi
